name: Fly me to the moon (Erizux)
description:
I made this game for the one bit jam with an astrology theme, it is a cute puzzle platformer where you have to take your body to a rocket so  the body will reach the moon. 

Trying to get on the rocket you die because of a bad fall, now nothing stops you from getting on the rocket and traveling to the moon, dare to get on the rocket and travel to space.

Short but fun, 5 levels made by hand, where you have to move the platforms to take your body to the rocket, inspired by "taken" I decided to bring that experience in first person form.

I did it as a solo developer and I would really appreciate your support, thanks fot playing 

my instagram if you wanna follow my dev log

https://www.instagram.com/erizux.dev/
